meanings.definition: エスカロニア科：双子葉植物の科の一つ。主に南米原産の木本植物を含む。
meanings.english_definition: A family of flowering plants in the order Asterales, comprising mostly woody plants native to South America.

etymology.value: New Latin, from the genus name Escallonia + -aceae (standard suffix for plant families). The genus Escallonia is named after Spanish explorer José Escallón.
